properties.areaDesc: Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal westward out to 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 24 at 2:42AM PST until January 25 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Gusty northwest winds and hazardous sea conditions.

* WHERE...Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal westward out to 10
NM.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM PST SATURDAY
